title: Who Is Samantha Hanratty’s Husband? Christian DeAnda’s Relationship History
description: Wondering who Samantha Hanratty’s husband is? The star of Yellowjackets, recognized for her mesmerizing performances, has captivated fans who are equally interested in her personal life. Throughout the years, Hanratty has garnered the attention of audiences globally for her genuine nature and charm. However, beyond her public persona, many are equally eager to learn about […] The post Who Is Samantha Hanratty’s Husband? Christian DeAnda’s Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Fans are curious about Samantha DeAnda's husband. Here's everything about the Yellowjackets star's spouse and their journey together.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Wondering who Samantha Hanratty’s husband is? The star of Yellowjackets, recognized for her mesmerizing performances, has captivated fans who are equally interested in her personal life. Throughout the years, Hanratty has garnered the attention of audiences globally for her genuine nature and charm. However, beyond her public persona, many are equally eager to learn about her personal life. So, here are all the details you need to know regarding Hanratty’s spouse and the couple’s relationship over the years. Who is Samantha Hanratty’s husband? Samantha Hanratty is married to Christian DeAnda. Like Hanratty, her husband is a prominent individual in the entertainment industry. He is presently employed as an assistant editor for AV Squad in the post-production phase. Previously, he has also worked as a production and camera assistant. As stated on his LinkedIn profile, DeAnda earned his Bachelor of Arts in Film and Digital Media from the University of California, Santa Cruz. Moreover, he has a strong enthusiasm for creating engaging visual and audio content, as he is keen to “collaborate with like-minded professionals in the industry.” Samantha Hanratty and Christian DeAnda’s relationship history Samantha Hanratty and her husband, Christian DeAnda, initially crossed paths five years ago via the dating app Bumble. As per The Knot, the couple’s meeting occurred in 2020, after both had matched on the app during the COVID-19 pandemic. One year following their initial meeting, they made the decision to become engaged. Consequently, DeAnda proposed to Hanratty in 2021. The actress even announced the thrilling news on Instagram, captioning the photo with, “So…I’m going to marry the love of my life! I said YESSSSS and cried for hours, cheers to the future Mr and Mrs. DeAnda.” On November 11, 2023, Hanratty and DeAnda exchanged vows in a private ceremony attended by their family and friends. As reported by The Knot, the couple hosted their wedding at the Terra Mia Vineyards in Paso Robles, California. They were surrounded by 140 guests, which included several of Hanratty’s co-stars from the Showtime series Yellowjackets. On December 31, 2024, Samantha Hanratty and Christian DeAnda announced the arrival of their first child together, a boy named Levi, on her Instagram. Currently, the two are going strong and enjoying parenthood together.
html:
Wondering who Samantha Hanratty’s husband is? The star of Yellowjackets, recognized for her mesmerizing performances, has captivated fans who are equally interested in her personal life. Throughout the years, Hanratty has garnered the attention of audiences globally for her genuine nature and charm. However, beyond her public persona, many are equally eager to learn about her personal life.

So, here are all the details you need to know regarding Hanratty’s spouse and the couple’s relationship over the years.

Who is Samantha Hanratty’s husband?

Samantha Hanratty is married to Christian DeAnda.

Like Hanratty, her husband is a prominent individual in the entertainment industry. He is presently employed as an assistant editor for AV Squad in the post-production phase. Previously, he has also worked as a production and camera assistant.

As stated on his LinkedIn profile, DeAnda earned his Bachelor of Arts in Film and Digital Media from the University of California, Santa Cruz. Moreover, he has a strong enthusiasm for creating engaging visual and audio content, as he is keen to “collaborate with like-minded professionals in the industry.”

Samantha Hanratty and Christian DeAnda’s relationship history

Samantha Hanratty and her husband, Christian DeAnda, initially crossed paths five years ago via the dating app Bumble.

As per The Knot, the couple’s meeting occurred in 2020, after both had matched on the app during the COVID-19 pandemic. One year following their initial meeting, they made the decision to become engaged.

Consequently, DeAnda proposed to Hanratty in 2021. The actress even announced the thrilling news on Instagram, captioning the photo with, “So…I’m going to marry the love of my life! I said YESSSSS and cried for hours, cheers to the future Mr and Mrs. DeAnda.”

On November 11, 2023, Hanratty and DeAnda exchanged vows in a private ceremony attended by their family and friends. As reported by The Knot, the couple hosted their wedding at the Terra Mia Vineyards in Paso Robles, California. They were surrounded by 140 guests, which included several of Hanratty’s co-stars from the Showtime series Yellowjackets.

On December 31, 2024, Samantha Hanratty and Christian DeAnda announced the arrival of their first child together, a boy named Levi, on her Instagram. Currently, the two are going strong and enjoying parenthood together.
